title: The Magical Adventures of Clementine Mitch: A Witch Can Switch
description: Clementine is a witch with a wish - to be a ballerina. This magical tale takes the reader from a world of bats and cats to the pink and sparkly world of ballet. But as Clementine finds out, it is not all tutus and ballet slippers.In a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity Clementine's wish is picked out from the cauldron and she gets to live out her dream at High Kicks Girls' Ballet Academy. The only problem is she arrives without her wand and with her rival nasty Nellie on her heels. Clementine has to rely on her wits and a newfound friendship if she is going to make it through to the audition. A perfect gift for young readers who love magic, dance and fun.
author: Jan  Oldham
